@CDCgov @sctimes @POTUS Recently, my colleagues in the House and Senate showed Americans living in farm country that they have our full support by providing funding for FRSAN. An initial 450,000 was granted to @UMNExt and Iowa Extension to begin a pilot program. https://t.co/TsFTd0Gp3x

@CDCgov @sctimes The Farm Bill passed the House and was ultimately signed by @POTUS, with my STRESS Act included. I was proud to see this effort move forward with support from my colleagues on both sides of the aisle. https://t.co/CU0CuGg1cp
@CDCgov Read more background on the intention behind the STRESS Act via the @sctimes here ↓ https://t.co/5XL4bhEwyl

@CDCgov The Farm and Ranch Stress Assistance Network (FRSAN) will give states needed resources to provide services including hotlines, community outreach, education, & home delivery of assistance. I was successful in including this language in the 2018 Farm Bill. https://t.co/0ePPC3liOK

@CDCgov As a result, I introduced the Stemming the Tide of Rural Economic Stress and Suicide (STRESS) Act to make mental health treatment available for farmers, ranchers, & agricultural workers by reauthorizing the Farm and Ranch Stress Assistance Network (FRSAN). https://t.co/lvGNTzYo6Q

@CDCgov Livelihoods of those who feed, fuel & clothe the world depend on factors largely outside of their control, which can be a uniquely stressful environment. They also lack access to mental health services. In half of the U.S. counties, there is no psychiatrist or psychologist.

According to a 2016 @CDCGov report, people working in agriculture had one of the highest rates of suicide, due to the nature of their work and the lack of access to mental health care professionals in rural America.

On Thanksgiving, it's important to remember and be grateful for those who produce all the food our families enjoy, both today and every day. Farmers and ranchers work endlessly to ensure our grocery stores are full and our children are nourished.

My staff was honored to meet with the @DoleFoundation. Our nation is grateful to our service members and veterans for their sacrifice but we often forget to support the #HiddenHeroes who care for them when they return home. Visit https://t.co/yb8eft7uVa to learn more. https://t.co/j5po0O3Hbb

I recently visited Mike Bray from Monticello, who created an “Honor the Badge” tribute saddle to show respect for our law enforcement officers. They set aside their personal safety to maintain ours and I am committed to providing them with the resources and support they need! https://t.co/PmFLF1PSlE

1 in 5 Americans experiences a mental health condition. I joined @peopleincorp CEO Jill Wiedemann-West to discuss ways to improve access to mental health care. Read the Q&A here: https://t.co/C57a2Kkgz0

I was honored to celebrate the @USNavy’s 244th birthday with 25 Minnesotans who will be commissioned to work on the USS Minneapolis Saint Paul! I remain committed to ensuring they have everything they need to preserve the safety and security of the United States. #ForgedByTheSea https://t.co/HligY3YltB

Nominations are open for the National Small Business Week Awards! This effort by @sba_minnesota highlights the backbone of our economy: our main street businesses who keep our nation moving forward. For more information on how to nominate, visit here: https://t.co/AXuD7E4a3p
